channel.title: Point system dont save?
channel.description:
WEll i was doing this tut and it was all good with no errors. It said the right stuff but when i relog, all my points disspear? I was following this tut: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/317814-pi-adding-point-system.html
If you can help, please post

item.title: Point system dont save?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Also, on top of that, make sure your ints for how long the string is in playersave is correct, that is one of the issues people seem to have.
If you need explanation on what I mean by this, feel free to ask.

Read full topic

item.title: Point system dont save?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

did you add the point variable to PlayerSave.java to save the line to the player files?

Read full topic

item.title: Point system dont save?

item.description:
@Pandora7 wrote:

idk what can we wrong with it…

item.title: Point system dont save?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Double check your playersave file to verify it’s actually saving, and you didn’t paste something wrong.

If so, post both the player and NPCHandler classes, along with your player save file (Remove the password, please for safety, along with any other confidentail info possibly held in the save. (IP, bank pin, etc. etc.)), and I’ll look over them.

Read full topic
